price: (14) And they have upon me a [claim due to] sin, so I fear that they will kill me."
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَيَّ ذَنۢبٞ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walahum ʿalayya dhanbun fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
